summary:
this will change what severel perks do

**I AM OPEN FOR REQUESTS**
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=\"30\"]Mikaelarps Perks Revisited[/size][/b]

This will change what severel pers in skrim do and in some cases what u need to optain them
(in some cases this will change what perks u can get after what perks)

Here is the changes
-------------------------------------------------------

[size=\"7\"]Alchemy Perks[/size]

Benefactor

Vanilla Effect
Potions you mix with beneficial effects have an additional 25% greater magnitude.

MPR Effect
Potions you mix with beneficial effects have an additional 50% greater magnitude.


Green Thumb

vanilla Effect
Get 2 ingreadients instead of one when gathering

MPR Effect
Get 4 ingreadients instead of one when gathering


Snake blood
*Renamed to Trolls blood*

Vanilla Effect
50% poison recistance

MPR Effect
Regenerate 3 life per second

------------------------------
One handed perks

Bladesman

Vanilla Effect
Gives X chance to make critical hit with swords

MPR
Gives X chance to make critical hit with swords, greatswords and daggers


Bone Breaker

Vanilla Effect
Ignores X armor when attacking with maces

MPR Effect
Ignores X armor when attacking with maces and warhammers

-----------------------------------------------------------
Speech perks

Allure 

Vanilla Effect
10% better prices with the other sex

MPR Effect
20% better prices with the other sex

-----------------------------------------------
Sneak Perks

Assasins Blade

Vanilla Effect
Sneak attacks with daggers now do a total of fifteen times normal damage.

MPR Effect
Sneak attacks with one-handed weapons now dp a total of fifteen times normal damage.20%[/size]
author: mikaelarp
